available_tools.name: run_metabolic_fba
available_tools.description: Run Flux Balance Analysis (FBA) on a metabolic model using a configurable simulation method.

available_tools.name: analyze_essentiality
available_tools.description:
Analyze gene and reaction essentiality to identify critical components
    required for model growth and viability.

available_tools.name: analyze_metabolic_model
available_tools.description:
Analyze structural properties of a metabolic model including
    reaction connectivity, pathway completeness, and potential gaps.

available_tools.name: analyze_reaction_expression
available_tools.description: Analyze reaction expression levels using pFBA to obtain realistic flux distributions.

available_tools.name: resolve_biochem_entity
available_tools.description: Resolve biochemistry entity IDs (compounds/reactions) to human-readable names and aliases

available_tools.name: search_biochem
available_tools.description: Search the biochemistry database for compounds and reactions by name or alias
